description: Cooking by weight is the most accurate and easy way to measure ingredients. Kitchen Scale tells you how much common ingredients weigh. You can find out how much a teaspoon, tablespoon, or cup of an ingredient weighs in grams or ounces.
exampleInteractions: Alexa ask Kitchen Scale how much does one cup of honey weigh
Alexa ask Kitchen Scale how much does two cups of peanut butter weigh
Alexa ask Kitchen Scale about bananas
name: Kitchen Scale
shortDescription: This app tells you the weight of common baking ingredients.
